data.title: Strasbourg climate: Weather Strasbourg & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Strasbourg

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Strasbourg

>>average temperature by month Strasbourg

>>Weather Strasbourg

The climate here is mild, and generally warm and temperate. There is significant rainfall throughout the year in Strasbourg. Even the driest month still has a lot of rainfall. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cfb. In Strasbourg, the mean yearly temperature amounts to 11.1 °C | 51.9 °F. Precipitation here is about 964 mm | 38.0 inch per year.

Strasbourg are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Strasbourg

Precipitation is the lowest in April, with an average of 67 mm | 2.6 inch. Most precipitation falls in December, with an average of 93 mm | 3.7 inch.

average temperature by month Strasbourg

At an average temperature of 20.3 °C | 68.6 °F, July is the hottest month of the year. In January, the average temperature is 2.3 °C | 36.1 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

Weather by month // weather averages Strasbourg

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

Between the driest and wettest months, the difference in precipitation is 26 mm | 1 inch. The average temperatures vary during the year by 18.0 °C | 32.5 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (83.66 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (64.97 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is December (15.17 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is September (10.80 days).

Strasbourg weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Strasbourg

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Strasbourg, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 11.46 hours of sunshine. In total there are 355.23 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month with the fewest daily hours of sunshine in Strasbourg is January with an average of 4.04 hours of sunshine a day. In total there are 125.13 hours of sunshine in January.

Around 2765.71 hours of sunshine are counted in Strasbourg throughout the year. On average there are 90.77 hours of sunshine per month.

Airport close to Strasbourg

The closest Airports of Strasbourg are: Strasbourg-Entzheim Airbase (SXB) 10.07km,Metz-Nancy-Lorraine Airport (ETZ) 118.96km,Dole–Jura Airport (DLE) 242.99km

You can reach Strasbourg from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Paris (ORY), Lyon (LYS), Porto (OPO), Casablanca (CMN), Toulouse (TLS), Nantes (NTE), Marseille (MRS), Tunis (TUN), Palermo (PMO), Rome (FCO), Lisbon (LIS), Amsterdam (AMS), Algiers (ALG), Izmir (ADB), Marrakesh (RAK), Prague (PRG), Brussels (BRU), Bordeaux (BOD), Houmt Souk (DJE)
